abstract: Saskatchewan’s securities regulator will hear BHP Billiton’s challenge to Potash Corp’s shareholder rights plan on November 8-9, assuming the federal government allows BHP’s $39 billion bid to proceed.
snippet: Saskatchewan’s securities regulator will hear BHP Billiton’s challenge to Potash Corp’s shareholder rights plan on November 8-9, assuming the federal government allows BHP’s $39 billion bid to proceed.
lead_paragraph: Saskatchewan’s securities regulator will hear BHP Billiton‘s challenge to Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan‘s shareholder rights plan on Nov. 8 and 9, assuming that the Canadian government allows BHP’s $39 billion bid to proceed.

headline.main: BHP Challenge to Potash’s Poison Pill Is Set
